resp = client.indices.put_settings(
    index="*",
    settings={
        "index.search.slowlog.include.user": True,
        "index.search.slowlog.threshold.fetch.warn": "30s",
        "index.search.slowlog.threshold.query.warn": "30s"
    },
)
print(resp)
